categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Sallius Wen was a male Mirialan Jedi Knight who fought for the Galactic Republic during the Great Galactic War against the Sith Empire. During the war he was stationed on the planet Voss where he asked a Republic aligned individuals to destroy the Mirr Sith artifact despite the request of the Voss Tolec-Da that it be recovered.
